body.name: Storkcraft Alpine Changing Table (White) – GREENGUARD Gold Certified Nursery Changing Table, Includes Water-Resistant Changing Pad, 2 Shelves for Nursery Storage and Organizing
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 15 hrs 18 mins
features: NURSERY ESSENTIAL WITH WATER-RESISTANT CHANGING PAD: Classic nursery changing table organizer with easy-to-match, universal design; 2 open storage shelves for nursery and changing essentials; Includes water-resistant changing pad and safety strap

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: GREENGUARD Gold Certified products are low-emitting and contribute to cleaner indoor air for you and your family; Certified products are screened for more than 10,000 chemicals and VOCs known to pollute indoor air

JPMA CERTIFIED, SAFETY TESTED: Expert tested by third-party, accredited laboratories to meet or exceed all applicable category voluntary and mandatory safety standards; Applied finish tested to meet or exceed applicable ASTM and CPSIA safety standards

AWARD-WINNING BRAND: Exclusively from Storkcraft, proud recipient of the 2022 Women’s Choice Award for 9 out of 10 Customer Recommended Baby & Kids Furniture and Parent Tested Parent Approved (PTPA) Seal of Approval

QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP: Crafted with sustainable New Zealand pine wood, engineered wood, and wood composites; Assembly required; Packaging is tested to reduce the risk of incidental shipment-related damage; Backed by 1-year limited warranty
body.description: The Storkcraft Alpine Changing Table combines clean lines, modern style, and a universal design that will match perfectly with your baby's nursery. The Alpine includes a water-resistant vinyl changing pad with safety strap, and 2 open shelves to keep your most important nursery essentials nearby. JPMA certified and tested to meet or exceed all applicable federal safety standards, the Alpine is backed by Storkcraft's 1-year limited warranty and supportive customer care. Complete the Storkcraft Alpine Collection with the matching Alpine 4-Drawer Chest, Alpine 6-Drawer Double Dresser, and Alpine 4-in-1 Convertible Crib. Exclusively from Storkcraft, proud recipient of the 2022 Women's Choice Award for 9 out of 10 Customer Recommended Baby & kids furniture.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Storkcraft Alpine Changing Table Modern, versatile, and crafted to make changing time a breeze. The Storkcraft Alpine Changing Table combines a classic nursery essential with a fresh, minimalist design. Complete with a water-resistant changing pad, safety strap, and two open shelves to store your nursery and changing essentials, the Alpine was built with parents' needs in mind.

Awards & Certifications Proud recipient of the PTPA Seal of Approval Proud recipient of the Parent Tested Parent Approved (PTPA) Seal of Approval, the leader in consumer product awards for families, based on the unbiased and authentic testing from North America's largest parent testing community. JPMA Certified Expert tested by independent laboratories to ensure this product meets the highest standards for your child’s safety. Women's Choice Award Winner Proud recipient of the 2021 & 2022 Women's Choice Award for 9 out of 10 Customer Recommended Baby & Kids Furniture, as voted by mothers across America.

Features Nursery essential: 2 open shelves to store and organize nursery items and changing essentialsWater-resistant changing pad: Includes water-resistant baby changing pad and safety strapVersatile design: An easy-to-match, universal design available in a multiple non-toxic finishes to pair perfectly with your nursery

Available in two non-toxic finishes White The Storkcraft Alpine Changing Table is available in a crisp and timeless white finish. Gray The Storkcraft Alpine Changing Table is available in a cool gray finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we needed!
reviews.reviewText: We’ve had it for 2 1/2 years now and it’s still very sturdy and good quality. Very good price as well. Easy to put together too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great changing table
reviews.reviewText: tall, stable, large shelves where you can put a lot of things

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good temporary option
reviews.reviewText: We bought this to put in our bedroom to use for the first 6 months before they could start staying in their nursery. It was easy to build & will definitely get the job done for what we need. But it doesn’t quite look like it will hold up over a long period of time. I watched my neighbors baby, who’s just shy of a year old & he’s very tall/long, 20lbs. I put them on the changing table & he was almost too long haha but the table held up well to his weight & it didn’t shake or move a lot as I changed their diaper. Very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The changing pad was the worst part of the changing table. It is flimsy & thin. Would purchase a separate changing pad. Overall the table is sturdy & easy to put together with one person. Shelves would fit containers 11 inches or smaller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Changing Table
reviews.reviewText: Love this changing table. It fits the cube organizer storage shelves perfectly (11x11) and is easy to put together. We put ours on carpet and were concerned about it not being sturdy, but with all the stuff you store on the bottom shelves, it’s perfectly fine.I would recommend buying a separate changing pad since the one it comes with is really thin.Also, shipping to Hawaii took long (over 3 weeks). Not sure if it’s because of COVID-19, but just plan ahead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and Perfect!
reviews.reviewText: This changing table was incredibly simple to assemble. Once everything was put together I loved how it looked in my nursery! I feel like it can be used as a shelf AND as a changing table. I love how durable it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Piece of crap!
reviews.reviewText: Product came damaged and storkcraft refuses to replace or refund! DO NOT PURCHASE.The legs aren’t an even even and is a risk to the baby!Do not waste your money on this poorly made product.I tried calling customer care, spoke to a Cecilia, who told me to give her a sticker number, I explained that there was no sticker - she goes “maybe there is”- again there was not. I asked to speak to a manager and she told me she couldn’t transfer the call.
